params._treasury: Address that receives the 5% treasury cut

getOdds(bytes32,uint256[]).details: Since we don't track all agentIds, caller provides the agent IDs to query.

claimPrize(bytes32).notice: Claim winnings from a settled battle. Uses withdraw pattern with reentrancy guard.

createBattle(bytes32).notice: Create a new battle. Only oracle can call.

getBattlePool(bytes32).notice: Get total pool size for a battle.

getOdds(bytes32,uint256[]).notice: Get total amount bet on each agent. Returns parallel arrays of agentIds and their pools.

getUserBets(bytes32,address).notice: Get all bets placed by a user in a battle.

placeBet(bytes32,uint256).notice: Place a bet on an agent in a battle.

settleBattle(bytes32,uint256).notice: Settle a battle by declaring the winning agent. Distributes treasury, burn,         jackpot carry-forward, and top bettor bonus. Winners claim via claimPrize().

sponsorAgent(bytes32,uint256,string).notice: Sponsor an agent in a battle. Sponsorship amount is BURNED (sent to dead address), not pooled.
